description: Unlock 1000+ Micro SaaS ideas that people are searching for on Google.
title: Micro SaaS Vault | Free Micro SaaS Ideas Database
introduction: Micro SaaS Vault provides free access to over 1000 profitable Micro SaaS ideas that people are actively searching for on Google. The platform helps users channel existing demand into effortless sales by offering insights into average monthly search volumes and keyword difficulty for ranking on Google.
features: Insights into search volumes and keyword difficulty
Sorting and filtering options for product ideas
pricing: It's 100% free and new ideas are added frequently

faqs.question: Is access to the Micro SaaS ideas completely free?
How frequently are new ideas added to the platform?
faqs.answer: New ideas are added frequently to ensure users never run out of new opportunities.
